Photography

This app is designed for small photography studios, including freelancers and small organizations. It is built to cater to both corporate clients (team building events, professional events, product photography) and individual clients (weddings, family events, pregnancy shoots, pet shoots, etc.).

External Events

Lead generation and management

Through the website

From the website, a potential client can ask for a quote or simply get in touch. They can fill some extra details about their needs:

  • Type of shooting session/event
  • Potential date
  • Their contact information

Email alias

Leads can come via email using info@<your_odoo>.odoo.com.

Once a lead has been created, you can use it as a central point from where you can reach your customer. Any reply they send will directly arrive on the lead!

Quote

After qualification through a call or meeting, a quote is generated detailing the event requirements. Clients can sign online to confirm the quote. You can use the quote templates (which will customize the emails that get sent to the customer). Don't hesitate to customize them!


Project

Once the quote is confirmed, a project is created for the shooting session. You can modify these template projects to suit your needs, e.g. by adding tasks to them. You don't want to use project management? Feel free to replace the product by their 'no-service' equivalent to avoid the creation of a project.

Studio Shoots

Lead generation

From the website or via the email alias, as above.

Quote

Once qualified (call/meeting), a quote is created for the shooting with details on schedule and expected service etc. Customer can sign online to confirm.

Appointment

Clients get a link to book an appointment - this link can be sent from a Sales Order or from a Task. The link directly binds to the correct appointment type and is easy to remember or type manually (e.g. https://<your_odoo>.odoo.com/book/studio). The appointment page is not publicly available on the website, you can only register an appointment when given the link.

The client can book whatever time slot they would like from there.

Project

Once the quote is confirmed, a project is created for the shooting session, as above.

Invoicing

With Odoo, you get invoicing out-of-the-box! Invoice directly from your order, configure a payment provider and voilà! Your clients can pay their invoice online.




Want to go further?

Install new Apps to do even more with Odoo! Here are a few suggestions:

  • Sign: send contracts to prospects and get the full traceability of their online signature
  • Accounting: do more than simple invoicing - with Odoo Accounting, you can generate tax reports, manage your invoices and bills and even synchronize payments from your bank account automatically
  • Planning: manage plannings for team members and resources, like a studio room or some hardware
  • Surveys: get your prospect to fill surveys before or after a shoot
  • Email Marketing and Social Marketing: reach out to your clients regarding special events or offers, or prospect for new clients​​​​
  • ​and much more!
